items.sentence: Tom thought it would be difficult for Mary to get a ticket to that concert.
Tom told John that he would ask Mary to the dance only if John asked Alice.
Have you made up your mind what you\'re going to give Tom for his birthday?
I don\'t want to go back to school. I wish summer vacation would never end.
As long as I\'m going to be in Boston, I\'ll try to see if I can visit Tom.
Tom can still wear the same size jeans he did when he was twenty years old.
Tom checked to make sure all the doors were locked before he went to sleep.
The teacher wrote something on the blackboard in a language I didn\'t know.
Tom called to say you can\'t stay with him next week when you visit Boston.
The reason Tom didn\'t go with us was because he didn\'t have enough money.
